entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
